Shure SM7B Vocal Microphone

For studio sound that speaks volumes.

How It Works

The wide-range frequency response of the SM7B preserves the natural beauty of the sound it captures.
With its detailed audio profile, words may travel far, but they always arrive at their destination with quality and clarity intact.
